alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Henry; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 8:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rockdale, northwestern Henry and eastern Clayton Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 811 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Kelleytown, or 7 miles north of McDonough, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Stockbridge, Hidden Valley Park, Rex, Panola Mountain State Park, Richardson Park, Kelleytown and Eagles Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
